text.text_translated: Earthquakes are when the ground shakes. They can break buildings and bridges. But bridges do not often fall down. Modern bridges fall down even less. This is because engineers build them well. They design bridges for places where the ground does not move much. This helps bridges stay safe.

best_attempt.text_translated: Earthquakes can break bridges. But bridges do not fall down often. Modern bridges fall down even less. Engineers know how to build bridges. They build them in places with earthquakes. They choose ground that is very strong. This ground does not move much. This design helps bridges stay safe.
